annotations.description: Johnny's Smoked Chocolate recalls all of the flavors of S;mores without being cloyingly sweet. This cocktail was created by Shane Mathew Gardener (yes I know...
annotations.title: Johnny's Smoked Chocolate a S'more's style Nightcap!

textContent:
6-7 Drops Vanilla Extract
1oz (30ml) Blended Scotch
1oz (30ml) Espadin Mezcal
.5oz (15ml) Creme de Cacao

Stir and strain into small glass.
Optionally spritz orange peel and discard.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bIClttdP_6g
title: Johnny's Smoked Chocolate
